params.user_prompt: I will use AI to create a photo for the {{workflow.parameters.game_name}} Game. The photo to be created should be old and nostalgic. Do not use the names of the characters in the game. I will show the person in the photo I uploaded within the game. Create a specific prompt for me. I will directly copy and paste it. No extra information, just the prompt.
